general.name: mos_target_carton_to_target
general.description: The table stores the targets assigned to a given carton along with information about the instrument that will observe that target, and offseting data.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_carton_to_target-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

carton_to_target_pk.name: CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK
carton_to_target_pk.description: The primary key. A sequential identifier.

lambda_eff.name: LAMBDA_EFF
lambda_eff.description: The effective wavelength at which the object will be observed

carton_pk.name: CARTON_PK
carton_pk.description: The primary key of the carton in the mos_target_carton table.

target_pk.name: TARGET_PK
target_pk.description: The primary key of the target in the mos_target_target table.

cadence_pk.name: CADENCE_PK
cadence_pk.description: The primary key of the cadence in the mos_target_cadence table.

priority.name: PRIORITY
priority.description: The target priority. Used for scheduling.

value.name: VALUE
value.description: An internal metric of the target value used for scheduling.

instrument_pk.name: INSTRUMENT_PK
instrument_pk.description: The primary key of the instrument in the mos_target_instrument table.

delta_ra.name: DELTA_RA
delta_ra.description: The RA offset for fibre positioning, in arcsec.

delta_dec.name: DELTA_DEC
delta_dec.description: The Dec offset for fibre positioning, in arcsec.

inertial.name: INERTIAL
inertial.description: Whether this is an inertial target (no proper motion will be applied).
